title: Failure to Load Game After Champion Select Following New Patch + Bug Splat Causing LeaverBuster AFKs
body: Client / Game loading bug splats always occur after patches. Game loading slow or not at all. Team offers remake before loaded into game. Getting penalized even though I have no history of leaving games intentionally. Riot, please help review my account and correct this patch issue. It is causing me to lose unnecessary LP.

replies.body: We aren't able to remove [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), and even though it's intentional it still causes other players a negative experience.  Still, it sucks that happened and I'd like to help.  These bugsplats usually result from driver issues or something else like bad game files.  I suggest going through each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot and fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions.

What bothers me it that it shows I earned gold from being in the game, however it never loaded and I didn't enter the game at all. Why am I penalized a full 18 LP when it wasn't intentional, but you can intentionally dodge in champ select and only lose  3 LP?
